help-file.title: INGREDIENTS
help-file.content: Various "Ingredients" are located throughout the world, buried under the ground. Herbs, Garlic, Nightshade, Mandrake Roots and Dragon's Blood are just a few of the many ingredients that exist. Alchemists require stock- piles of these ingredients in order to "Mix" their potions. Whereas, Forest Druids only require Herbs. You can gather ingredients via the "Forage" command.
